Regional Atmospheric Modeling System (RAMS) bụ usoro mmemme kọmputa nke na-eṅomi ikuku màkà nyocha ihu ígwé na ihu ígwé na màkà amụma ihu igwe (NWP)
Ihe ndị ọzọ gụnyere nyocha data na ngwugwu ngosi.
E mepụtara RAMS n'ime ébé afọ 1980s na Mahadum Colorado State (CSU), nke William R
Pielke duziri, màkà nhazi ihu igwe mesoscale
Tremback na-eme mmepe na-esote n'okpuru nlekọta nke Cotton na Pielke
Ọ bụ ihe nlereanya zuru oke na-abụghị hydrostatic
Edere yà na Fortran na koodu C ụfọdụ ma ọ na-agba ọsọ kachasị mmá n'okpuru sistemụ arụmọrụ Unix. E wepụtara mbipụta nke isií n'afọ 2009.
RAMS bụ ihe ndabere màkà usoro na-eṅomi ikuku Martian nkè a na-akpọ MRAMS.
